health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Mohamed Ndanda, Hon. Zeinab Omar Mumba, Hon. Serah Nyamvula, Hon. Duncan Onyango, Hon. Riziki Fundi, Hon. Karisa Munyika Nzai
health_data_challenges: Insecurity issues in the areas represented by Hon. Mohamed Ndanda, including incidents of killings and harassment due to lack of security measures.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: To involve the Security committee team of Mombasa to address insecurity issues and ensure the security of residents.
health_evidence_base: Incidents of insecurity and killings in the areas of concern.
